continue: Continue by logging into your account
logoutAllSuccess: Successfully logged out from all devices
createAccountDescription: Enter your information to create your new account
registerSuccess: Registration successful! Redirecting to login page.
registerErrorTryAgain: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
emailHelpText: Enter your registered email address. We will send you a password reset link.
emailSentDescription: A password reset link has been sent to <email>{email}</email>.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps:
steps: Don't forget to check your spam folder
Reset your password by clicking the link
The link is valid for 15 minutes

securityNotice.title: Security Notice:
securityNotice.description: For security reasons, the password reset link will expire in 15 minutes. If you did not receive an email, check your spam folder.

notifications.sendError: An error occurred while sending the email

logoutModal.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
logoutModal.descriptionCurrent: You are about to log out from this device. After this action:
logoutModal.descriptionAll: You are about to log out from all devices. After this action:
listCurrent: Your current session will be terminated.
Your sessions on other devices will continue.
You will need to log in again.
listAll: All your active sessions will be terminated.
Your access on other devices will be cut off.
You will need to log in again.
logoutModal.error: An error occurred while logging out.
